long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Struggling to Stay Consistent? Falling Behind on Your Daily LeetCode Goals?

Discover the Perfect Solution to Keep You on Track and Achieving More Every Day! 🚀

LeetBoard is a virtual leaderboard that keeps you accountable and tracks the number of coding problems you solve daily on LeetCode. 📊💡 Perfect for developers preparing for interviews, sharpening skills, or simply staying consistent.

 Why Use LeetBoard?
    📈 Boost Accountability: Studies show that tracking progress increases consistency by up to 40%!
    🏅 Stay Motivated: Compete with friends and celebrate milestones together.
    👥 Friendly Competition: Add friends and challenge each other to solve more problems.

🌐 Get Started Today!
Take your coding journey to the next level with LeetBoard! Whether you're preparing for interviews or leveling up your skills, LeetBoard keeps you consistent, motivated, and on track. 💻✨
